attacks.name: Rallying Horn
attacks.text: If any of your Ethan's Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does 100 more damage.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.text: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Buzzing Boost
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when this Pokémon moves from your Bench to the Active Spot, you may search your deck for up to 3 Basic Grass Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Jet Cyclone

attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gadget Show
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each Pokémon Tool attached to all of your Pokémon.

abilities.name: Flower Curtain

abilities.name: Mysterious Rock Inn

attacks.name: Double Headbutt

attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 50 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Buddy Blast

abilities.name: Melt Away

attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each Supporter card that has "Team Rocket" in its name in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Add On

attacks.name: Gnaw Through
attacks.text: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tools from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Greedy Order
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may put up to 2 Arven's Sandwich cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Push Down
attacks.text: You may switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

name: Arven's Sandwich
rules: Heal 30 damage from your Active Pokémon. If that Pokémon is an Arven's Pokémon, heal 100 damage from it instead.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Cynthia's Power Weight
rules: The Cynthia's Pokémon this card is attached to gets +70 HP.

name: Emcee's Hype
rules: Draw 2 cards. If your opponent has 3 or fewer Prize cards remaining, draw 2 more cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Energy Recycler
rules: Shuffle up to 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Ethan's Adventure
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 in any combination of Ethan's Pokémon and Basic Fire Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Granite Cave
rules: Steven's Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) take 30 less damage from attacks from the opponent's Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Judge
rules: Each player shuffles their hand into their deck and draws 4 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Sacred Ash
rules: Shuffle 5 Pokémon from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Spikemuth Gym
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may search their deck for a Marnie's Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into their hand. Then, that player shuffles their deck.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Team Rocket's Archer
rules: You can use this card only if any of your Team Rocket's Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn.Each player shuffles their hand into their deck. Then, you draw 5 cards, and your opponent draws 3 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Ariana
rules: Draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand. If all of your Pokémon in play are Team Rocket's Pokémon, draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand instead.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Bother
rules: Turn 1 of your opponent's face-down Prize cards face up and choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card. You may have your opponent switch those cards. (That Prize card remains face up for the rest of the game.)
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Factory
rules: Once during each player's turn, if they played a Supporter card that has "Team Rocket" in its name from their hand this turn, they may draw 2 cards.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Team Rocket's Giovanni
rules: Switch your Active Team Rocket's Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Team Rocket's Pokémon. If you do, switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Great Ball
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for an Evolution Team Rocket's Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If tails, search your deck for a Basic Team Rocket's Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Petrel
rules: Search your deck for a Trainer card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Proton
rules: If you go first, you may use this card during your first turn.Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Team Rocket's Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Transceiver
rules: Search your deck for a Supporter card that has "Team Rocket" in its name, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Venture Bomb
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. If tails, put 2 damage counters on your Active Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Watchtower
rules: You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: TM Machine
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 Pokémon Tool cards that have "Technical Machine" in their name, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Energy
rules: This card can only be attached to a Team Rocket's Pokémon. If this card is attached to anything other than a Team Rocket's Pokémon, discard this card.As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides 2 in any combination of Psychic Energy and Darkness Energy.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.text: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Cheer On to Glory
abilities.text: Attacks used by your Cynthia's Pokémon do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Flower Curtain
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokémon that don't have a Rule Box by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)

abilities.name: Mysterious Rock Inn
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon ex.

attacks.name: Superb Scissors
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Charging Up
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rocket Rush
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Team Rocket's Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Hydra Breath
attacks.text: Discard 6 Basic Grass Energy cards from your hand, and Knock Out your opponent's Active Pokémon. If you can't discard 6 cards in this way, this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Hurried Gait
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may draw a card.

attacks.name: Buddy Blast
attacks.text: This attack does 60 more damage for each Ethan's Adventure card in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Cruel Coal
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

attacks.name: Scorching Fire
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Inferno Kick Flurry
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. This attack also does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Flustered Leap
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may discard the bottom card of your deck. If you do, discard all cards from this Pokémon and put this Pokémon on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Swim Together
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Misty's Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Shell Press
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 10 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.text: Choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into their deck.

attacks.name: Gadget Show
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each Pokémon Tool attached to all of your Pokémon.

abilities.name: Rocket Brain
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn, you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Team Rocket's Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: This attack does 40 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Explode Together Now
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage for each Pokémon in play that has "Koffing" or "Weezing" in its name (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Deceit
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Torment
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks. During your opponent's next turn, that Pokémon can't use that attack.

attacks.name: Strong Bash
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon equal to the damage done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Reckless Abandon
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are tails, this Pokémon also does 90 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Paw-cket Pilfer
attacks.text: Choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into their deck.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Dizzy Punch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 90 damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Greedy Order
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may put up to 2 Arven's Sandwich cards from your discard pile into your hand.

abilities.name: Buzzing Boost
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when this Pokémon moves from your Bench to the Active Spot, you may search your deck for up to 3 Basic Grass Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Jet Cyclone
attacks.text: Move 3 Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Oil Salvo
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon 6 times. (You can choose the same Pokémon more than once.) For each time you chose a Pokémon, do 20 damage to it. This damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Aroma Shot
attacks.text: This Pokémon recovers from all Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Flame Screen
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 50 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Evil Incineration
attacks.text: Discard a Team Rocket's Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, discard your opponent's Active Pokémon and all attached cards.

abilities.name: Golden Flame
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach up to 2 Basic Fire Energy cards from your hand to 1 of your Benched Ethan's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shining Feathers
attacks.text: Heal 50 damage from each of your Pokémon.

abilities.name: Snow Camouflage
abilities.text: Whenever your opponent plays an Item or Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crushing Press
attacks.text: You may discard a Stadium in play. If you do, this attack does 140 more damage.

attacks.name: Avenging Billow
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dynamic Dive
attacks.text: You may do 120 more damage. If you do, this Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Dual Bolt
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: High-Voltage Press
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra Energy attached (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 100 more damage.

abilities.name: Power Saver
abilities.text: This Pokémon can't attack unless you have 4 or more Team Rocket's Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Erasure Ball
attacks.text: You may discard up to 2 Energy from your Benched Pokémon. This attack does 60 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Regi Charge
attacks.text: Attach up to 2 Basic Fighting Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Giant Rock
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Stage 2 Pokémon, this attack does 140 more damage.

attacks.name: Corkscrew Dive
attacks.text: You may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Draconic Buster
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tainted Horn
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. During Pokémon Checkup, put 8 damage counters on that Pokémon instead of 1.

abilities.name: Biting Spree
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may choose 2 of your opponent's Pokémon and put 2 damage counters on each of them.

attacks.name: Assassin's Return
attacks.text: You may put this Pokémon into your hand. (Discard all cards attached to this Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Vigorous Tackle
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has no damage counters on it, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: Boss Headbutt
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Boss Headbutt.

attacks.name: Haughty Order
attacks.text: Reveal the top 10 cards of your opponent's deck. You may choose an attack from a Pokémon you find there and use it as this attack. Shuffle the revealed cards into your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Cruel Slash
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Emcee's Hype
rules: Draw 2 cards. If your opponent has 3 or fewer Prize cards remaining, draw 2 more cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Ethan's Adventure
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 in any combination of Ethan's Pokémon and Basic Fire Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Judge
rules: Each player shuffles their hand into their deck and draws 4 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Archer
rules: You can use this card only if any of your Team Rocket's Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn.Each player shuffles their hand into their deck. Then, you draw 5 cards, and your opponent draws 3 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Ariana
rules: Draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand. If all of your Pokémon in play are Team Rocket's Pokémon, draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand instead.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Giovanni
rules: Switch your Active Team Rocket's Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Team Rocket's Pokémon. If you do, switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Petrel
rules: Search your deck for a Trainer card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Team Rocket's Proton
rules: If you go first, you may use this card during your first turn.Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Team Rocket's Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

abilities.text: Once during your turn, when this Pokémon moves from your Bench to the Active Spot, you may search your deck for up to 3 Basic Grass Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Boss Headbutt.

attacks.name: Assassin's Return
attacks.text: You may put this Pokémon into your hand. (Discard all cards attached to this Pokémon.)

name: Jamming Tower
rules: Pokémon Tools attached to each Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) have no effect.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Levincia
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may put up to 2 Basic Lightning Energy cards from their discard pile into their hand.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.
